It is a really fun game that has a large skill gap. There are many things to master like the uniquely CS:GO movement, weapon sprays, maps, grenades, and more. Overall, it's a great game

This game is an instant classic and an astonishing one. From Counter Strike 1.6, to this the development and hard work of Valve has certainly paid off. This game does not only require great aim but also great brains. If you aren't a good aimer then once playing this game, it would really help you and after that you would just find the game to addictive to quit. I only have about 700 hours by the time im writing this review but yet not once have i thought about refunding the game. Compared to other multiplayers this game is fairly less toxic and has a passionate community. Also Negev is awesome.
great game, you know if it wasn't infested with hackers and smurfs  still fun tho
This game is fun you should try it

世界各地的玩家特别是东南亚玩家素质很高，特别有竞技精神，技术很好，而且友善。

This game is only for the most determined. This game manages to cull players after the first 100-200 hours. 

Only bother playing this game if you actually want to put time and effort into it.

This is a very solid game but my only request is that the developers would put more time and effort into making the game better, instead of just using it for profits.
